info_overview: The flush-mounted receiver can be used to switch loads on and off via radio (for information about permitted loads, see the technical data). When it receives the radio signal, the flush-mounted receiver switches the corresponding contact.
approved_export:
{ "database_id": 547, "label": "507502", "manufacturer_name": "Merten", "manufacturer_id": "007A", "device_ref": [ "8001:8002", "8001:8004" ], "version_min": 0, "version_max": 255.255, "decription": "Flush-mounted switch", "overview": "
